prompt: Build a mobile-first admin panel with a drawer navigation containing menu items for Dashboard, Users, Orders, Products, Analytics, and Settings, each with an icon and highlighting the active one. The main content shows a vertical list of user management cards, each with an avatar, name, email, role badge (Admin/User/Manager), and Edit/Delete buttons. At the top, add a search bar with a filter icon. Include a full-width bottom bar with an 'Add New User' button. Use soft gradients, rounded corners, and subtle animations for a polished mobile experience.
